nl.inl.util

Class FileProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.util.FileProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class FileProcessor
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Process (trees of) files, which may include archives that we want to recursively process as well. This class is thread-safe as long as no configuration is changed during processing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FileProcessor.ErrorHandler
      Handles error, and decides whether to continue processing or not.
      static interface  FileProcessor.FileHandler 
      static class  FileProcessor.SimpleErrorHandler
      Simple error handler that reports errors and can abort or continue.

      • skipFile

        protected boolean skipFile(String fileName)
        Should we skip the specified file because it is a special OS file? Skips Windows Thumbs.db file and Mac OSX .DS_Store file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file
        Returns:
        true if we should skip it, false otherwise

      • setErrorHandler

      • setFileHandler

        public void setFileHandler(FileProcessor.FileHandler fileHandler)

      • processFile

        public void processFile(File file,
                        String pathSoFar)
                 throws FileNotFoundException
        Process a file or directory. If this file is a directory, all child files will be processed, files within subdirectories will only be processed if isRecurseSubdirs() is true. For rules on how files are processed, regarding archives etc, see processInputStream(String, InputStream, File).
        Parameters:
        file - file, directory or archive to process
        pathSoFar - path so far, so we can report the path to the file
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • processInputStream

        public void processInputStream(String path,
                               InputStream is,
                               File file)
        Process from an InputStream, which may be an archive or a regular file. Archives (.zip and .tar.gz) will only be processed if isProcessArchives() is true. GZipped files (.gz) will be unpacked regardless. Note that all files within archives will be processed, regardless of whether they match pattGlob
        Parameters:
        path - filename, optionally including path to the file or path within an archive
        is - the stream
        file - (optional) the file from which the InputStream was built, or - if the InputStream is a file within an archive - the archive. This is only used for reporting to FileHandler and ErrorHandler

      • abort

        public void abort()
        Like close() but immediately abort all running handler tasks and cancel any pending tasks. Subsequent calls to close, processFile or processInputStream will have no effect.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the executor and wait until all running and pending handler tasks have completed. Calling close() while processFile or processInputStream is in progress will cause them to skip all remaining files. Files for which a task has already been put in the queue will still be processed as normal. Subsequent calls to close, processFile or processInputStream will have no effect.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
